author: Lincoln @Presidentlin
text:
Deepseek is such a cool lab.

Every time they see the open source community is struggling with something, they give their candidate answer and go back to the bottom of the oceans. 

Reasoning models almost got locked up in private labs, OAI, and Sam are soooo good at deflecting, making whatever discovery seems super unreachable.

DeepSeek comes, shares what they learn, next 6 months, everyone has the good stuff.

Every lab and its Dog has a thinking model, mostly thanks to them.
